video_prompt: Glowing blue energy pulsates and crackles from a massive, multi-layered circular structure, streams flowing into turquoise water, illuminating its surface. Waterfalls cascade from rocky cliffs.
image_prompt: A massive, multi-layered circular city/structure, resembling an amphitheater or power station, made of light stone/metal, in a vast turquoise body of water. Glowing blue energy emanates from and surrounds the structure, with light bands tracing concentric rings and crackling electrical discharges flowing into the water. An ornate bridge connects the structure to lush green cliffs with numerous waterfalls. A rugged mountain range is in the background under a dramatic, cloudy sky. Fusion of ancient architecture, futuristic energy, and powerful nature.
refined_video_prompt: Blue energy pulses and crackles, surging from an intricate, multi-layered structure that subtly shifts with its power. Streams of this energy flow into turquoise water, causing its surface to ripple and intensely glow. Waterfalls plummet from towering cliffs, their spray rising into the air.
